attributes.action: Only parents and children can use child and parent parking bays
attributes.additional_details: I see on a daily basis and miss out on parent and child parking bays to people who don't have children with them. They fail to understand that parking in normal bays with small children is dangerous as cars can swing into bays without knowing what our who could be in the bay and potentially run children over. Also, people can park too close to cars and parents are unable to place their children into seats from the door.
attributes.background: I want to make it so parents with children who are age appropriate to hold badges for parent and child parking bays so if anyone who parks there without a child/children and a badge can be fined like disabled parking fines.

rejection.details:
The following petitions call for similar actions: 

Introduce mandatory fines for people parking in parent & child bays without kid
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/747698

Give permits for parent and child bays to stop the misuse of these spaces 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/728595

Petition for Parent/Child Parking Badges for children up to age 13
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/739884
